docs.text: Streamer Setup Development To write code and generate the documentation you need to install the packages listed in requirements.txt with pip pip3 install -r requirements.txt PYTHONPATH To use the 4DGame SDK you have do add the lib folder to your PYTHONPATH variable. Additionally add the src folder to your PYTHONPATH for nicer imports and automatic documentation. export PYTHONPATH = " $( pwd ) /src: $( pwd ) /lib" Documentation The Documentation is generated with the help of mkdocstrings . To implement a module, class or function into your documentation you have to reference it as follows: ::: library.module ::: library.module.class ::: library.module.function On Device For the usage on Device the packages listed in requirements.txt should be installed: pip install -r requirements.txt Next setup the controller service with scripts/systemd-setup
